reference.title: epub.include.auto.rellinks Ant parameter
reference.shortdesc: Turns on inclusion of auto-generated related links (as for normal HTML output)

section.p: Any value (e.g. "true") sets the property to true.
Not set (no related links are generated)

Controls base Toolkit processing by turning off the maplink-check and maplink targets, which has the effect of eliminating auto-generated related links. Note that explicitly-authored related links are not affected.
